page.title: 13Village Life. Robert Winters
page.content: The second person who we went to visit as part of our Domesday Survey was Robert Winters a boy who lives at Heapham a village in our area. He has always lived in the same bungalow with his father, mother and older brother. He is nine years old and his birthday is on 21st. January. He goes to school in Corringham which is two and a half miles away. On school days he gets up at half past seven and eats cereals for breakfast. When he is ready for school he catches the bus at half past eight and it takes him fifteen minutes to get to school. This gives him enough time to play games before school starts at a quarter past nine. His best friend is Daniel Burgess and he lives in Corringham. This means it is difficult for them to see each other outside of school. {See next page.
